objectives: Students will discuss shopping and consumer behavior using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Drama themed scenarios related to shopping and consumer behavior
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining shopping and consumer behavior content with Drama narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore shopping and consumer behavior through a Drama lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dramatic conflict or emotional crisis involving shopping and consumer behavior

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to shopping and consumer behavior in a drama context
Students engage in drama themed role-play about shopping and consumer behavior using informal register
Students create original drama themed content about shopping and consumer behavior in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe shopping and consumer behavior in a Drama scenario?
What conflict or tension might be involved in shopping and consumer behavior?
Can you create a Drama story about shopping and consumer behavior?
How does shopping and consumer behavior change when viewed through a Drama perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this drama scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Drama situation involving shopping and consumer behavior
roles: Character A: Using informal register in drama context
Character B: Responding in informal register within drama theme

topic_genre_blend: shopping and consumer behavior with conflict
shopping and consumer behavior with tension
shopping and consumer behavior with struggle

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Drama theme: Intense emotions, conflicts, life challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Drama themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
